title: Marnie Simpson "might have exaggerated" about Lewis Bloor to Aaron Chalmers - and says she'll STOP any fight between men
text:
Marnie Simpson heartbroken over Lewis Bloor's cheating Share this video Watch Next 
“Although I did help him incredibly a lot through our relationship, it wasn’t all one sided as he did guide me in different ways. He was kind and loving and encouraged me in everything I did, which is why I’m so torn apart by his actions, I didn’t expect it. 
“Our relationship was happy, strong and amazing despite anything these horrid girls have said. I refuse to let it turn what was real for me into a lost cause. 
"And I don’t want the past 8 months of my life to be a total waste. S**t happens, even to good people, life goes on, stop the hate and continue your support always.” Marnie fell for Lewis in Celebrity Big Brother last year They were inseparable in the CBB house (Photo: Channel 5) Read More Devastated Marnie Simpson 'smashes up her house' after discovering Lewis Bloor cheated 
Lewis Bloor posted a lengthy apology to Twitter on his split from Marnie, which Aaron retweeted and added, "Why don't you start by paying back some of the 20-25K you sponged off her?" 
Lewis is alleged to have cheated on Marnie with a girl he met after a Drake gig at London's O2 Arena, with Marnie revealing the news of his behaviour on Twitter after seeing a video of him with the other girl. 
"Didn't really want the whole country to know but looks like that didn't last long," she tweeted after the incident. "Happy Valentine's Day to me. U f**king scumbag!" 
She later said: "Tonight I get the worst feeling I’ve ever experienced when I saw the video of him in bed with the girl. 
"I can’t actually believe it. I’ve cried, I’ve screamed, I’ve smashed my house up. Every emotion, I’m still in shock. 
"I’ve never been cheated on until now, it’s the first time I’ve experienced what it feels like, it is awful, it's horrendous." Marnie was heartbroken by the cheat claims 
Lewis, meanwhile, posted a public apology to Marnie. 
He wrote: "I am utterly disappointed in myself for hurting such an amazing girl, she did not deserve any of the pain I have caused. 
"It was a drunken mistake, a terrible thing I wish I had the courage to just admit my wrong doing so Marnie did not have to find out from these girls. 
"I was with Marnie for the right reasons. A lot of the stuff that's been said is lies. 
"Marnie is a great girl and I am clearly a fool for ruining what was something very special. Like us on Facebook
